vep_cache_version.description: Use a different cache version than the assumed default (the VEP version).

vep_species.description: Species for your data. This can be the latin name e.g. homo_sapiens or any Ensembl alias e.g. mouse

ecr_registry.description: Amazon ECR registry for container images (e.g. '<account-id>.dkr.ecr.<region>.amazonaws.com')

vep_genome.description: Reference Assembly and version for the species, e.g. GRCh38

id.description: Raw input data as a string. May be used, for example, to input a single rsID or HGVS notation quickly to vep. Default: null
